EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Welcome to FRTB
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have created an account for you to access FRTB within our UAT environment: https://productsuat.markit.com.
If clicking the link does not work, please copy and paste the URL in a new browser window instead.
Username: <Customer Email Address>
In order to login, please first reset your password by following the instructions on this page:https://productsuat.markit.com/home/resetPasswordRequest.jsp.
Should you require any documentation, access to our FAQs or to log a case for FRTB, please select Support on the drop down menu.
If you have received this email in error or have any other questions, please contact us at: support@markit.com.
Kind regards,
IHS Markit Support
U.S.: + 1 877 762 7548 EMEA: + 800 6275 4800 Asia Pacific: + 65 6922 4210 Email: support@markit.com {!Case.Thread_Id}
